info.name: Gitlab Dark
info.description:
A dark theme for the website https://gitlab.com
Now with support for Octotree Extension for Chrome
info.additionalInfo:
Version 1.0.7
Licence: GNU v3
Last Edit: 01/02/2017 18:33
Repository: https://bitbucket.org/2E0PGS/userstyles/overview

I suggest you set your Syntax Highlighting Theme to "Dark" under your /profile/preferences Page!

data.title: Style slightly broken on settings page
.card-title a, .card-number needs to be light, not 0,0,0
No longer works with new GitLab 10 UI
Half of UI is still white. Looks very ugly.
This theme is not updated for gitlab 10 UI, try GitLab Dark and Flat for an updated theme
